title: Between 1 July 2017 and 30 June 2018, will an armed group from Sudan engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Sudan?
preds: Based on general news and GJP consensus.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
I am a bit surprised that the statistical risk assessment gives such a high score

During the first eight months of 2017, 234 civilians have been killed deliberately by all actors combined. Chances are, that the Sudanese gov. will continue to hold back, as it would like to have sanctions removed.
Not going to zero yet because with everyone's attention elsewhere occupied, unrestricted slaughter could resume in the west.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.
The previously imposed ceasefire has been violated
